title: Preserved plum tart
description: This plum tart will make an impressive finish to a dinner party. The fruit is preserved in jars ahead of being used to top a frangipane-filled pastry case. (This recipe makes enough pastry for two tarts, so keep half in the fridge or freezer for another time.)
ingredients: 500g/1lb 2oz plain flour, plus extra for dusting
splash ice cold water, if needed
